ldc_scope.charseq: Once the vote is resolved one way or another, Bush will intensify his case for war, officials said, barring unforeseen events such as Saddam suddenly disarming or going into exile

extent.charseq: President George W. Bush and his advisers looked beyond the diplomatic showdown and made plans for a public relations buildup to potential war

extent.charseq: the White House left open the possibility Tuesday that it would not seek a United Nations vote on its war

ldc_scope.charseq: With opposition hardening, the White House left open the possibility Tuesday that it would not seek a United Nations vote on its war-making resolution if the measure was headed for defeat

extent.charseq: U.N. Security Council debate on the U.S.-backed war
